Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Adam R Lehmann
Reviews.Content: When in the market for a very basic laptop (one that can hang out on my coffee table for anyone to surf, check email, or whatever) I did a great deal of comparison around this price point. In terms of features, processing power, and memory (processing and storage) this laptop beat all comperably priced models by a landslide. A comperable laptop in terms of performance was at least another $150.Now that I have used if for a few weeks, I am stil impressed. Satisfies the intneded need perfectly, and I have also loaded up some software development and simulation software which the machine handles just fine.I highly recommend this is an excellent choice for a general purpose laptop.

Reviews.Title: Love my new computer!
Reviews.Author: Chella
Reviews.Content: i have been using my new computer for one week now and i love it!  love that it's compact and not oversized.  it's pretty fast and i love the keyboard!  the only thing i wish was different is the screen, not a big fan of the glossy screen, but not a deal breaker.  i also wish it was just a little ligher, but other than those two items, i am very happy! i recommend this computer to everyone!

Reviews.Title: DISAPPOINTED
Reviews.Author: Gina Gill "treasures of books"
Reviews.Content: The computer arrived with a dead battery! Dell needed to send a new one for me and I ended up paying additional shipping. In addition, one of the USB ports works when it feels like.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: It is the same as it is described. I really like it. It has run about 1 year without any problem.

Reviews.Title: It so far has been a great laptop.
Reviews.Author: s.mathews
Reviews.Content: Recently went out of town for 2 months to sell my parents home, needed a good laptop that I could count on.  It has been great and a nice size.

Reviews.Title: Greatest Computer in the World
Reviews.Author: Amber Ferguson
Reviews.Content: Have been a Dell buyer for life, I hate 15" or larger computers, this one was perfect for me (I hate the number pad on a large computer), gets dusty easily because of the material but easy to clean.  Love the way things look on the screen, and super easy to restore when you want a fresh start!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Eliseo
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my wife.  It is great, I am happy with the purchase and my wife is happy with her new laptop.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspirin
Reviews.Author: Carol Chadwick
Reviews.Content: Like it very much! Only problem is that it's Window 7 and after working with earlier issues of Window (from DOS through Windows XP) it takes new learning and being 88 years old find Windows 7 frustrating.

Reviews.Title: beauty and powerful
Reviews.Author: Juan Jimenez
Reviews.Content: I really love my laptop. is very minimalist, but super powerful, has great performance and design, the only thing I could criticize is that the inner shell is easily scratched and meaningless. of the external balance has no problem and makes it look good.

Reviews.Title: great computer for this price
Reviews.Author: fujimaru
Reviews.Content: The  only issue was the battery was quiet a challenge to star charging it once replace every thing when just fine

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Janice R
Reviews.Content: I have been a Dell fan for years, owning several desktop models, and this is now my seventh laptop.  As always, Dell did not disappointment me with the quality and features of this laptop.  Besides the very older two that have now been retired, I currently have two XPS 17 with i7 processors and two Inspiron 15R with i3 processors, all are beautiful machines.  With this 14 inch laptop, I was looking for something smaller and lighter for traveling and this has fit that need perfectly.  You can never go wrong with a Dell computer, I buy Dell exclusively.

Reviews.Title: good but.......
Reviews.Author: aguika
Reviews.Content: The battery that came with the computer didn't charge for the first 2 weeks. I had to ask Dell to send a replacement battery. After I received the new one (that worked) the other one started to charge. A serious company should test their products before shipping.

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: its ok serves my purpose. cant say best buy but was ok can rate it a 7.5/10. if you are looking for high capacity ones then this serves..

Reviews.Title: LP 14" DELL
Reviews.Author: josip
Reviews.Content: I was very hapy whan I resived this LP.It is nice, I like it. This is my favorite LP.Thanks for this, You are very profesional company.I hope that we will have a good cooperation in future.Thanks a lot.Josip

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5 2450M Processor 2.5GHz
6GB DIMM RAM
500GB 5400RPM Hard Drive
14-Inch Screen, Intel HD Graphics 3000
Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron i14RN-1593BK 14-Inch Laptop (Diamond Black)
